snippet.title: CritterGarden Gameplay Trailer - Steam Next Fest
snippet.description:
CritterGarden is a cozy ecosystem simulator with an evolutionary twist. Plant crops, build quirky robots to help automate your work, and discover dozens of cute Critters across a branching tree of life.
Play the demo during the upcoming Steam Next Fest!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2663200/CritterGarden/
